com.interfacecomparateur.slidemenu

Class SizeCallbackForMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interfacecomparateur.slidemenu.SizeCallbackForMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SizeCallback

    public class SizeCallbackForMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements SizeCallback
    Helper that remembers the width of the 'slide' button, so that the 'slide' button remains in view, even when the menu is showing.

      • getViewSize

        public void getViewSize(int idx,
               int w,
               int h,
               int[] dims)
        Description copied from interface: SizeCallback
        Used by clients to specify the View dimensions.
        Specified by:
        getViewSize in interface SizeCallback
        Parameters:
        idx - Index of the View.
        w - Width of the parent View.
        h - Height of the parent View.
        dims - dims[0] should be set to View width. dims[1] should be set to View height.
